code: import{USER_ACTION_TYPES}from'./user.types';import{createAction,withMatcher}from'../../utils/reducer/reducer.utils';export var checkUserSession=withMatcher(function(){return createAction(USER_ACTION_TYPES.CHECK_USER_SESSION);});export var setCurrentUser=withMatcher(function(user){return createAction(USER_ACTION_TYPES.SET_CURRENT_USER,user);});export var googleSignInStart=withMatcher(function(){return createAction(USER_ACTION_TYPES.GOOGLE_SIGN_IN_START);});export var emailSignInStart=withMatcher(function(email,password){return createAction(USER_ACTION_TYPES.EMAIL_SIGN_IN_START,{email:email,password:password});});export var signInSuccess=withMatcher(function(user){return createAction(USER_ACTION_TYPES.SIGN_IN_SUCCESS,user);});export var signInFailed=withMatcher(function(error){return createAction(USER_ACTION_TYPES.SIGN_IN_FAILED,error);});export var signUpStart=withMatcher(function(email,password,displayName){return createAction(USER_ACTION_TYPES.SIGN_UP_START,{email:email,password:password,displayName:displayName});});export var signUpSuccess=withMatcher(function(user,additionalDetails){return createAction(USER_ACTION_TYPES.SIGN_UP_SUCCESS,{user:user,additionalDetails:additionalDetails});});export var signUpFailed=withMatcher(function(error){return createAction(USER_ACTION_TYPES.SIGN_UP_FAILED,error);});export var signOutStart=withMatcher(function(){return createAction(USER_ACTION_TYPES.SIGN_OUT_START);});export var signOutSuccess=withMatcher(function(){return createAction(USER_ACTION_TYPES.SIGN_OUT_SUCCESS);});export var signOutFailed=withMatcher(function(error){return createAction(USER_ACTION_TYPES.SIGN_OUT_FAILED,error);});
